title: CeCe Winans talks new album,  lifting people's hope and faith in difficult times
body: Legendary gospel artist has sold more than 17 million records around the world, in addition to winning a whipping 12 Grammys, 23 Dove awards, and 15 Stellar awards. But through it all she's still a humble child of God from Detroit. Winans discussed her new album, "Believe for It," and her life's work of lifting people's hope and faith in difficult times.
